title: Rito pls
body:
Basically at the start of last week my LoL client has been having many problems leaving me unable to play, I created a ticket which all went fine until the Tech support people at Riot suddenly stopped replying to my ticket, it would usually take them **5-12 hours** to reply but in this case I had waited over **48 hours** with still no reply. Is it unreasonable for me to think that this is unfair? I assumed riot would want to try to get people to play their game and quite frankly this isn't helping the matter in the slightest. I feel like I'm not the only one being neglected by Riot so if you are then please speak up!

Have you guys had anything like this happen and do you agree with me that this isn't good enough?

replies.body:
Mate, they usually take around a week to get back to me.

Consider yourself very lucky.
